verses.verse: Ye are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: ye shall not <S%H1413>cut<s%> yourselves, nor <S%H7760>make<s%> any <S%H7144>baldness<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

For thou art an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee to be a <S%H5459>peculiar<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto himself, above all the <S%H5971>nations<s%> that are <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H398>eat<s%> any abominable <S%H8441>thing<s%>.
These are the <S%H929>beasts<s%> which ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%>: the <S%H7794>ox<s%>, the <S%H7716>sheep<s%> <S%H3775><s%>, and the <S%H5795>goat<s%>,

The <S%H354>hart<s%>, and the <S%H6643>roebuck<s%>, and the fallow <S%H3180>deer<s%>, and the wild <S%H689>goat<s%>, and the <S%H1788>pygarg<s%>, and the wild <S%H8377>ox<s%>, and the <S%H2169>chamois<s%>.

And every <S%H929>beast<s%> that <S%H6536>parteth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, and <S%H8157>cleaveth<s%> the <S%H8156>cleft<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6541>claws<s%>, and <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts<s%>, that ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%>.

Nevertheless these ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, or of them that <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H8156>cloven<s%> <S%H6541>hoof<s%>; as the <S%H1581>camel<s%>, and the <S%H768>hare<s%>, and the <S%H8227>coney<s%>: for they <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, but <S%H6536>divide<s%> not the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>; therefore they are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.

And the <S%H2386>swine<s%>, because it <S%H6536>divideth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof<s%>, yet cheweth not the <S%H1625>cud<s%>, it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you: ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, nor <S%H5060>touch<s%> their dead <S%H5038>carcase<s%>.
These ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of all that are in the <S%H4325>waters<s%>: all that have <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%>:
And whatsoever hath not <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> ye may not <S%H398>eat<s%>; it is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.
Of all <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%>.
But these are they of which ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%>: the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>, and the <S%H6538>ossifrage<s%>, and the <S%H5822>ospray<s%>,
And the <S%H7201>glede<s%>, and the <S%H344>kite<s%>, and the <S%H1772>vulture<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
And every <S%H6158>raven<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
And the <S%H1323>owl<s%> <S%H3284><s%>, and the night <S%H8464>hawk<s%>, and the <S%H7828>cuckow<s%>, and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>,
The little <S%H3563>owl<s%>, and the great <S%H3244>owl<s%>, and the <S%H8580>swan<s%>,
And the <S%H6893>pelican<s%>, and the gier <S%H7360>eagle<s%>, and the <S%H7994>cormorant<s%>,
And the <S%H2624>stork<s%>, and the <S%H601>heron<s%> after her <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H1744>lapwing<s%>, and the <S%H5847>bat<s%>.
And every creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H5775>flieth<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you: they shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
But of all <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> ye may <S%H398>eat<s%>.

Ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of any thing that dieth of <S%H5038>itself<s%>: thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is in thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> it; or thou mayest <S%H4376>sell<s%> it unto an <S%H5237>alien<s%>: for thou art an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>. Thou shalt not <S%H1310>seethe<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H2461>milk<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H6237>truly<s%> <S%H6237>tithe<s%> all the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, that the <S%H7704>field<s%> bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> there, the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of thy <S%H1715>corn<s%>, of thy <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and of thine <S%H3323>oil<s%>, and the <S%H1062>firstlings<s%> of thy <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of thy <S%H6629>flocks<s%>; that thou mayest <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3117>always<s%>.

And if the <S%H1870>way<s%> be too <S%H7235>long<s%> for thee, so <S%H3588>that<s%> thou art not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> it; or if the <S%H4725>place<s%> be too <S%H7368>far<s%> from thee, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> there, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee:

Then shalt thou <S%H5414>turn<s%> it into <S%H3701>money<s%>, and bind <S%H6696>up<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and shalt <S%H1980>go<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H5414>bestow<s%> that <S%H3701>money<s%> for whatsoever thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusteth <S%H183>after<s%>, for <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, or for <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, or for <S%H3196>wine<s%>, or for strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>, or for whatsoever thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7592>desireth<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> there <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, thou, and thine <S%H1004>household<s%>, desireth: Heb. asketh of thee
And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>; thou shalt not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> him; for he hath no <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with thee.

At the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> all the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of thine <S%H8393>increase<s%> the same <S%H8141>year<s%>, and shalt lay it <S%H3240>up<s%> within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, (because he hath no <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with thee,) and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and the <S%H490>widow<s%>, which are within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>; that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> which thou <S%H6213>doest<s%>.
